channel.title: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Basics
item.description: Arrr! ☠ Pirrrates ☠ Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, some Merrrmaids and stuff. Chapter 1 Basics Discover what this Cap'n Hugo theme be all about an' th' core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Rambl'n
item.description: Arrr! ☠ Pirrrates ☠ Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, some Merrrmaids and stuff. Chapter 2 Rrrambl'n Find out how t' create an' org'nize yer rrrambl'n quickly an' intuitively.

item.title: Shorrrtcodes
item.description: Arrr! ☠ Pirrrates ☠ Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, some Merrrmaids and stuff. Chapter 3 Shorrrtcodes Cap'n Hugo uses Marrrkdown fer its simple rrrambl'n format. However, there be a lot o' th'ns that Marrrkdown doesn’t support well. Ye could use pure HTML t' expand possibilities. But this happens t' be a bad idea. Everyone uses Marrrkdown because it’s pure an' simple t' read even non-rendered.

item.title: This could be yers
item.description: Arrr! ☠ Pirrrates ☠ Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, some Merrrmaids and stuff. Chapter 4 This could be yours Start yer success story. Now!

item.title: Tests
item.description: Arrr! ☠ Pirrrates ☠ Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, some Merrrmaids and stuff. Chapter 5 Tests Some planks fer internal test'n o' differnt styles Code Some test'n fer different styles used 'n rules highlightn'n an' preformatted blocks Images Some test'n fer different styles o' image links Links Some test'n fer different styles o' links
